name: TeleBeans
description:
Credits

All code & graphics asset are created during jam. Skeleton animations are created using Mixamo.

Sound & music by kind people from freesound.org:

* 535905__temp6754__jump-climb-or-damage-sound-f

* 513667__mrthenoronha__cartoon-game-theme-loop-4

* 483598__raclure__wrong

* 403012__inspectorj__ui-confirmation-alert-a5

* 350871__cabled-mess__coin-c-04

* 332602__vckhaze__smoke-bomb

* 257274__natty23__puff-of-smoke

* 220173__gameaudio__spacey-1up-power-up

* 76190__movingplaid__concrete-step-4


Controls

LMB - Use Bean to teleport

RMB - Cancel teleportation

WSAD - Movement

R - Restart Level
